items.sentence: Tom put on some rubber gloves so he wouldn\'t leave fingerprints.
Tom said that he couldn\'t remember the last time he saw a movie.
Tom ate some food, drank some beer, and then went right to sleep.
Tom became a professional golfer after he graduated from college.
Tom began to sing his favorite song and Mary harmonized with him.
Tom bought a couple of loaves of bread on his way home from work.
When I was a child, my mother would often read fairy tales to me.
With Christmas just around the corner, I should do some shopping.

You need to put some ice on your ankle to keep the swelling down.
